Export.Routine:
formNameWWWKOPF(YKOPF) #include COMSYS #include WWWConst #define jsMarker(%1) #;define jsMarker(%1) write YCR,YCR,"",YCR,YCR ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Displays System Heading, including [logoff] button ; HTML Heading HTMLKOPF ; ; Inputs : ; YKOPF Current page title ; ; ByRef : ; ^WWWVAR variables ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 15-Jul-2014 shobby HEVA-1565: MenuType should also consider WWW012 ; 21-Oct-2013 shobby SESPE-581: Always show header if using a MegaMenu.... ; 20-Jun-2013 shobby CORE-127: Missing TR and TD could cause MegaMenu to appear above the buttons in firefox. ; 07-Jun-2013 shobby CORE-123: Removed extra border on MegaMenu ; 06-Jun-2013 shobby CORE-116.2: MegaMenu created in WWWBODY for COMViewSearch forms. ; 05-Jun-2013 shobby CORE-116: Create MegaMenu at this point. ; 30-Apr-2012 shobby SR17998: More detailed determination as to whether to show ; form header. ; 11-Dec-2009 GRF SR16871: class macros, cleanup, doco ; 15-Oct-2009 shobby SR16925: Only translate header if a language code exists. ; 06-Jan-2009 FIS don't use gradient filter with system colors ; 15-Dec-2008 HQN Added additional notes regarding functionality ; 25-Jul-2007 RPW SRadhoc: Rewrote in { syntax ; 07-May-2007 GRF SR15511: Doco; quits; expand commands ; 13-Dec-2006 JW BR014262: Rewrite. Use GetType fn. ; 18-Sep-2006 JW Cleaned up. ; 31-May-2005 RPW Added the job to the tooltip. ; 28.04.1998 DT GEAENDERT=57916,57692 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new YA,YQ,YVOR1,objWWW120 if ($$MenuType^WWW013() '= 13)&&($$MenuType^WWW013() '= 14) quit:$get(YKOPF)="" ;HEVA-1565 ;HEVA-1565 if $$$WWW013MenuType($get(^WWW013(0,YBED,1))) '= 13 quit:$get(YKOPF)="" ; FIXME : Precludes text codes with alpha prefixes but if that is allowed we ; might have a problem with hard-coded heading strings. if +YKOPF'=0 if $data(^WWW009(0,SPRACHE,YKOPF)) if $$^WWWTEXT(YKOPF)'=YKOPF set YKOPF = $$^WWWTEXT(YKOPF) ; Convert text code to heading text set YVOR1 = $get(^WWW012(0,0,1)) ; General Company Parameters ;--------------------------------------- set YQ = $$$YQEnable if $$DoNotDisplayFormHeader^WWW120(YFORM) set YQ=1 ;SR17998 ;SR17998 if $get(YFORM)'="" { ;SR17998 set objWWW120 = $get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)) ;SR17998 if $$$WWW120DoNOTDisplayFormHeader(objWWW120) { ;SR17998 set YQ = 1 ;SR17998 } elseif $$$WWW120InheritCompanyProperties(objWWW120) { ;SR17998 if $$$WWW012DoNotDisplayHeader(YVOR1) set YQ = 1 ;SR17998 } ;SR17998 } if ($$MenuType^WWW013() '= 13) quit:YQ=1 ;HEVA-1565 ;HEVA-1565 if $$$WWW013MenuType($get(^WWW013(0,YBED,1))) '= 13 quit:YQ=1 ;--------------------------------------- if $get(YUSER)'="" set $piece(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,10)=$$$YES ; Display Form heading ? $$$jsMarker("Form Title") write "" ;SR1799 ;HEVA-1565if $$$WWW013MenuType($get(^WWW013(0,YBED,1))) = 13 { ;CORE-123 if $$MenuType^WWW013() = 13||($$MenuType^WWW013() = 14) { ;CORE-123;HEVA-1565 write "" ;CORE-123 } else { ;CORE-123 do ^WWWFRAME(0,,,"FRAME_Header") ; open table ;CORE-81 ;CORE-123 } ;CORE-123 if ($$GetType^WWWMENU()=7) { ; POPUP do V3 } else { ;HEVA-1565 if ($$$WWW013MenuType($get(^WWW013(0,YBED,1)))=13)&&(YFORM'="")&&($$$WWW120FormType($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)))'=12) { if ($$MenuType^WWW013()=13)&&(YFORM'="")&&($$$WWW120FormType($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)))'=12) { ;HEVA-1565 if (YFORM'="COMViewSearch")||($$$WWW120FormType($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)))=5) { write "" ;CORE-127 } }elseif ($$MenuType^WWW013()=14)&&(YFORM'="")&&($$$WWW120FormType($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)))'=12) { ;HEVA-1565 if YFORM="WWWBLANK"{ if ($$$WWW120FormType($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)))=5) { write "" ;CORE-127 } } } else { do V2 } } do ^WWWFRAME(1) ; close table quit V1 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; VERSION CLASSIC ; NOTE: Not currently in use ; ; History: ; 09-Aug-2007 shobby BR014237: Call to CreateLoginLink so that pressing the X ; button will go back to the login screen. ; 09-Dec-2005 JW SR13195: Removed confirm msg ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- write YCR,"",YCR write "",YCR write "",YCR write "",YCR quit CreateLoginLink() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Draw the hyperlink nicely. ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 15-Feb-2010 shobby SR17176: Try and Catch to stop error when cancelling 'Discard ; Changes' message box. ; 16-Oct-2009 shobby SR16948: Can't use $job as a subscript to preserve URL ; in CacheTempURL ; 09-Aug-2007 shobby SRBR014237: Renamed from Blank and changed to call out ; to the login screen. ; 25-Jul-2007 RPW SRadhoc: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strURL set strURL = $get(^CacheTempURL(YUCI,YUSER)) if strURL="" set strURL = $$getLoginPage^WWWLogin() write "" ;SR17176 write "" ; "Logout" write "" quit ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Form Header (0/1/Locn/USER) | AlphaLinc 1.23.45 | (o) [X] V2^WWWKOPF ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; [Button Line] ;--------------------------------------- ; ; ; [Form] ; ; ;--------------------------------------- ; [Page End] ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; ; ; [ ] ; ; HeaderText(YFORM) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; History: ; 26-Dec-2013 shobby CORE-291.2: Don't UMLAU the text. ; 17-Dec-2013 shobby CORE-291: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strHeader set strHeader = $$FormHeaderOrImageFile^WWW120(YFORM) if $get(YMENUNAME)'="" { set strHeader=$TRANSLATE(YMENUNAME,"_"," ") ;CORE-291.2 } elseif $extract(strHeader)="@" { xecute "set strHeader="_$extract(strHeader,2,$length(strHeader)) } else { IF '$FIND(YKOPF,".gif") { set strHeader=" "_$TRANSLATE(YKOPF,"_"," ") } } quit strHeader V2 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; VERSION IN EINER FARBE ;with single colour ; ; History: ; 15-Jul-2014 shobby HEVA-1565: MenuType should also consider WWW012 ; 18-Dec-2013 shobby CORE-291: Subroutined HeaderText and removed WWWCoreChanges ; 25-Feb-2011 GRF SR17661: Pass ColorCodeForHeaderRight to Warning Light ; 08-Feb-2011 shobby SR17657: Dashboard indicator on RHS ; 22-Sep-2010 GRF SR17515: "FARBE" property is not language based; missing ; ; 21-May-2010 shobby SR17316: Missing > ; 22-Apr-2010 shobby SR17253: Cross Browser Support ; 01-Sep-2009 PPP SRAdhoc: Add the version #,and the ability to add some ; Text (e.g. BETA) ; 16-Dec-2008 HQN SR16240: Detect menu type 10, show links ; 12-Dec-2008 HQN SR16240: Moved System Information Tooltip building to ; $$GetSystemInfoTooltip for code reuse. ; 16-Sep-2008 shobby BR014983: Allow calling out to external routines. ; Called from form or customisation. ; 16-Sep-2007 shobby BR014983: Put the location name back in (and tidied up ; some 'new line' issues in the tooltip) ; 24-Oct-2007 GRF Separation of IP and Form ; 09-Aug-2007 shobby BR014237: Call to CreateLoginLink so that pressing the X ; button will go back to the login screen. ; 25-Jul-2007 RPW SRadhoc: Rewrote in { syntax ; 09-Dec-2005 JW SR13195: Removed confirm msg ; 25.04.2005 FIS SR12200: $$$WWW0121ColorTableHeader ; 11.12.2003 FIS colour on the right ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new COLOR,COLORR,strHeader ; D101 $$$WWW012ColorCodeForHeaderLeft() ; D147 $$$WWW012ColorCodeForHeaderRight() ; ; D112 $$$WWW120InDevelopmentBy => RED ; ; D75 $$$WWW0121ColorTableHeader set COLOR="" if $piece(YVOR1,Y,101)'="" set COLOR = $piece($get(^WWW100(0,"FARBE","EN",$piece(YVOR1,Y,101),1)),Y,1) if COLOR="" set COLOR = "DIMGRAY" set COLORR = $piece(YVOR1,Y,147) if COLORR'="" set COLORR = $piece($get(^WWW100(0,"FARBE","EN",COLORR,1)),Y,1) if COLORR="" set COLORR = COLOR if ($get(YFORM)'="") && ($piece($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,112)'="") { set COLOR = "RED" set COLORR = "RED" } if ($get(YLOCATION)'="") && (+$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,0,YLOCATION,1)),Y,75)'=0) { set COLOR = $piece($get(^WWW100(0,"FARBE","EN",$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,0,YLOCATION,1)),Y,75),1)),Y,1) set COLORR = COLOR } write YCR,"",YCR ;--------------------------------------- ; Form Header ;--------------------------------------- write "",YCR ;--------------------------------------- ; Version No ;--------------------------------------- if '(+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesALL($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1)))) { WRITE "" } ; 10 = "Flexible Menu" ;HEVA-1565 set objWWW013 = $get(^WWW013(0,YBED,1)) ;HEVA-1565 if ($$$WWW013MenuType(objWWW013) = 10) { if ($$MenuType^WWW013() = 10) { ;HEVA-1565 write "" write "" } if '(+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesALL($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1)))) { do WarningIndicator^WWWDASHBOARD(COLORR) ; SR17657, SR17661 } write "",YCR write "",YCR quit GetVersion() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Show the Version # ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 02-Sep-2009 PPP SRAdhoc: If Build with a Odd Minor Release is loaded, ; BETA is added to the Release (only if it is not DEV) ; 01-Sep-2009 PPP SRAdhoc: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strVer set strVer = $piece($get(^WWWVERSION(0,"AlphaLinc",1)),Y,1) if $get(^Development)'=1 { set intMinor = $piece(strVer,".",2) if intMinor#2 { set strVer = strVer _" BETA" } } quit strVer Calculator() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Show the calculator ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 25-Jul-2007 RPW SRadhoc: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new OPT,URL set URL = YAKTION_"EP=WWWFORM&YFORM=WWWCALC&YUSER="_YUSER_"&YBED="_YBED_"&YUCI="_$get(YUCI)_"&YM="_YM set OPT = "HEIGHT=260,WIDTH=220,SCROLLBARS=NO,RESIZEABLE=NO" write "    " write "" quit V3 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; VERSION WITH POPUP MENU ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 22-Apr-2010 shobby SR17253: Cross Browser Support ; 09-Aug-2007 shobby BR014237: Call to CreateLoginLink so that pressing the X ; button will go back to the login screen. ; 25-Jul-2007 RPW SRadhoc: rewrite in { syntax ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new COLOR,COLORR set COLOR="" if $piece(YVOR1,Y,101)'="" set COLOR=$piece($get(^WWW100(0,"FARBE","EN",$piece(YVOR1,Y,101),1)),Y,1) if COLOR="" set COLOR="DIMGRAY" set COLORR=$piece(YVOR1,Y,147) ;FARBE RECHTS;FIS;11.12.03 ;tincture on the right if COLORR'="" set COLORR=$piece($get(^WWW100(0,"FARBE","EN",COLORR,1)),Y,1) if COLORR="" set COLORR=COLOR if ($get(YLOCATION)'="") && (+$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,0,YLOCATION,1)),Y,75)'=0) { set COLOR = $piece($get(^WWW100(0,"FARBE","EN",$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,0,YLOCATION,1)),Y,75),1)),Y,1) set COLORR = COLOR } write YCR,"",YCR write "256 write " style="""_$$ImageTransformGradient^WWWFORMCrossBrowserSupportVisual(COLOR,COLORR)_";""" write " align=left nowrap>" write YCR write "" write "" write YCR do ^WWWUP($$$NO) write YCR if '$find(YKOPF,".gif") write " "_$$^WWWUML($translate(YKOPF,"_"," ")) write YCR write " " write "",YCR write "",YCR write "",YCR write "",YCR quit GetSystemInfoTooltip() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Returns a string containing correctly formatted string to be inserted into an ; construct ;--------------------------------------- ; System Information ; Company 0 (ALPHALINC) [deprecated information - reference removed] ; Location 1 (Locn1) ; Cost Centre CC (CostCentre) ; User USER (User Name) ; Language EN (English) ; IP 000.000.000.000 ; Form INFormName ; Job 1234 ;--------------------------------------- ; ; ByRefs: ; YM Company ID ; YLOCATION Location ID ; YCR Newline Character ; SPRACHE Language ID ; YBED User ID ; YIPADDR IP Address of current user ; YFORM FORM ID ; ; History: ; 28-May-2014 shobby CORE-385: Loosen ties to INCostCentre ; 11-Dec-2009 GRF SR16871: Add Cost Centre; skip deprecated YM; macros ; 12-Dec-2008 HQN SR16240: Rewrote to return instead of direct write, ; reusable in outside routines ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idCostCentre,strTooltip set strTooltip = $$^WWWTEXT(30038,,1) ; "System Information" set strTooltip = strTooltip_YCR_$$^WWWTEXT(388,,1)_" "_YLOCATION ; "Location" if YLOCATION'="" { set strTooltip = strTooltip_" ("_$extract($$$WWW0121LocationName($get(^WWW0121(0,0,YLOCATION,1))),1,80)_")" if ##class(%Library.Routine).Exists("INCostCentre") { ;CORE-385 set strTooltip=strTooltip_$$GetToolTip^INCostCentre(YLOCATION) } } set strTooltip = strTooltip_YCR_$$^WWWTEXT(232,,1) ; "Username" set strTooltip = strTooltip_" "_YBED if YBED'="" set strTooltip = strTooltip_" ("_$extract($$$WWW013Name($get(^WWW013(0,YBED,1))),1,80)_")" set strTooltip = strTooltip_YCR set strTooltip = strTooltip_$$^WWWTEXT(300,,1) ; "Language" set strTooltip = strTooltip_" "_SPRACHE if SPRACHE'="" set strTooltip = strTooltip_" ("_$extract($$$WWW100Text($get(^WWW100(0,"SPRACHE",SPRACHE,SPRACHE,1))),1,80)_")" set strTooltip = strTooltip_YCR set strTooltip = strTooltip_$$^WWWTEXT(33776,,1) ; "IP" set strTooltip = strTooltip_" "_$get(YIPADDR)_"  " if $get(YFORM)'="" { set strTooltip = strTooltip_YCR_$$^WWWTEXT(93,,1)_" "_YFORM _" "_$$GetGridForm() ; "Form" } set strTooltip = strTooltip_" "_YCR_$$^WWWTEXT(34165,,1)_" "_$job ; "Job" set strTooltip = strTooltip_" "_YCR_$$^WWWTEXT(34362,,1)_" "_$piece($zutil(54,13,$ZU(54,0)),",",1)_" " ;Server Machine quit strTooltip GetGridForm() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Returns the Edit Grid Form if there is one ; ; History: ; 30-Dec-2013 SCR SESDF655: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idGridForm,idParentUser set idParentUser = $$$GetParentUser(YUSER) set idGridForm = "" if idParentUser'="" && ($data(^CacheTemp(idParentUser,"Grid","Container"))#10) && ($get(^CacheTemp(idParentUser,"Grid","Container"))=$get(YFORM)) { set idGridForm = $get(^CacheTemp(idParentUser,"Grid","Name")) } quit idGridForm GetButtonStyle() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Returns a string containing styles relevant to GetMenuButton and ; GetOverviewButton ; ; History: ; 16-Dec-2008 HQN SR16240: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strHTML set strHTML = "" quit strHTML GetMenuButton() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Returns the HTML code for the Menu Button ; ; History: ; 21-May-2010 shobby SR17316: Firefox doesn't display buttons without display:block ; 16-Dec-2008 HQN SR16240: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strHTML set strHTML = "" quit strHTML GetOverviewButton() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Returns the HTML code for the Overview Button, used for Menu Type (10) ; Flexible Menu ; ; History: ; 21-May-2010 shobby SR17316: Firefox doesn't display buttons without display:block ; 16-Dec-2008 HQN SR16240: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strHTML set strHTML = "" quit strHTML
" ;CORE-127 write $$GetMegaMenu^WWWMegaMenu(YKOPF) //SR17998 ;CORE-116 ;CORE-116.2 write "
" ;CORE-127 write $$GetMegaMenu^WWWMenuSideBar(YKOPF) //SR17998 ;CORE-116 ;CORE-116.2 write "
" write "" write "",YCR do ^WWWUP($$$NO) write YCR if '$find(YKOPF,".gif") write " "_$$^WWWUML($translate(YKOPF,"_"," ")) ; überschrift write " ["_$get(YUCI)_"/"_$get(YM)_"]" write " " write "" do CreateLoginLink() write "
; [Start Anchor] [Form Header] [Session Information] ; [Version No.] [Flexible Menu] [Login Link X button]
256 write $$ImageTransformGradient^WWWFORMCrossBrowserSupportVisual(COLOR,COLORR) ;SR17253 ;SR17253 IF $PIECE(YVOR1,Y,101)'>256 WRITE "filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Gradient(GradientType=1, StartColorStr='"_COLOR_"', EndColorStr='"_COLORR_"');" ;FIS;11.12.03 ;SR16236 system colors write " border-right:none;" write """" ; end style write " ALIGN=LEFT>",YCR do ^WWWUP($$$NO) write "",YCR write $$HeaderText(YFORM) write "" ;--------------------------------------- ; Session Information (Company/Locn ID/Locn Name/User ID) ;--------------------------------------- write " " if $get(YFORM)="" { write "",YCR write " ("_YM if $get(YLOCATION)'="" { write "/"_YLOCATION write "/"_$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,0,YLOCATION,1)),Y,1) } write "/"_$get(YBED) write ")" write "" do Calculator() ;--------------------------------------- ; "In Development:" ;--------------------------------------- if COLOR="RED" write $$^WWWTEXT(32978)_" "_$piece($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,112) ; FIXME : What if user has set colour to RED? write "" write "" ;SR17316 WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "AlphaLinc "_$$GetVersion() WRITE " " WRITE ""_$$GetButtonStyle()_$$GetOverviewButton()_""_$$GetMenuButton()_"" do CreateLoginLink() write "
" do ^WWWMENU8 write "" do CreateLoginLink() write "
